statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: Texas Southern 51, Jackson St. 44
article.story: JACKSON, Miss. -- Junior Treasure scored 15 points and Deandre Hall added 12 to help Texas Southern defeat Jackson State 51-44 on Monday night. Trailing 10-8 midway through the first half, Texas Southern (8-9, 4-1 Southwestern Athletic Conference) went on an 11-2 run and led the rest of the way. Treasure's layup capped the run for a 21-10 Texas Southern lead with 1:24 left until halftime. Texas Southern held Jackson State (6-11, 4-1) to 19 percent shooting in the first half (4 of 21) for a 21-12 advantage at the break. Jackson State opened the second half on an 18-7 run and led 30-28 on Garrison Johnson's jumper with 12 minutes left. Texas Southern answered with a 10-2 run, capped by Timothy Price's layup with 4:45 remaining. Jackson State wouldn't get any closer than four the rest of the way. Garrison Johnson had 17 points for Jackson State, which snapped a six-game winning streak.
